participant_1.background:
I'm looking forward to spending time with my son playing some games together.
I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
i love huge paintings.
I prefer to read books to get my entertainment, so social media isn't very important to me.
i am saving up to buy a new camera.

participant_2.background:
I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog.
I'm proud of my ability to persevere through difficult times and continue to succeed in my career.
My most exotic place was in the mountains of Nepal where I went hiking and got to see the Himalayas.
I treasure my dog, Petrucci, more than anything else.
I get nervous about my juicing bar, but I have a solid plan and I know it will work because I have the support of my family.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun? I'm a wildlife photographer and I love spending time in the field!
I like to go hiking and explore new places. I'm also a dog owner and I love spending time with my dog.
That's awesome! What's your favorite place you've ever hiked?
I went hiking in Nepal once and it was amazing! I got to see the Himalayas up close.
That sounds incredible! I've always wanted to go to Nepal.
It's a beautiful country and the people are so friendly.
I think I'm going to have to add it to my bucket list!
You definitely should! It's a once in a lifetime experience.
I'm excited to hear more about your juicing bar. What kind of juices do you make?
I make a variety of juices, but my favorites are the green juices. They're packed with nutrients and they're so refreshing.
That sounds delicious! I'm going to have to try one of your juices sometime.
You definitely should! I think you'll love them
